name: Pomegranate Blood Splatter Cocktail
description: Todd Thrasher of Restaurant Eve shared this recipe for his "Dexter"-inspired cocktail as a ghoulish option for at-home Halloween entertaining.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces pomegranate juice, fresh if possible

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pomegranate juice, orange juice, vodka, Cardamaro, and egg white in the shaker and shake vigorously for 10 seconds without ice to emulsify the egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish drink with drizzled pomegranate molasses and serve.
